column1: Kata Robata////We weren't impressed by the food. We ordered the A5 wagyu special
column6: and green tea cheesecake to finish it off. The menu is a little pricey but we were willing to pay the price for exceptional food. We were disappointed. The food looked elevated and the ingredients seemed fresh but everything tasted monotonous
column8: and one-dimensional and left us unsatisfied. Nothing we had was memorable. We actually ended our dinner early and grabbed some more food elsewhere.
